body_html: I tried symbolic links from all the 9.0 filenames to all the 9.1 filenames and it didn't work. In the end, TF knows the true version. The repo doesn't even have 9.0 anymore so I'm afraid I'll break my nvidia stuff if I remove 9.1 and then manually install 9.0.

body: I tried symbolic links from all the 9.0 filenames to all the 9.1 filenames and it didn't work. In the end, TF knows the true version. The repo doesn't even have 9.0 anymore so I'm afraid I'll break my nvidia stuff if I remove 9.1 and then manually install 9.0.
